website_summaries.verdict: Desirable price point for individual irons that have all of the latest technological and design benefits.
pros: Offered as individual irons between 3- and 9-irons, along with multiple wedges
Includes a urethane insert in the club face, which provides you with a great feel on your shots
Weighting in the club head helps you keep your swing path on target for consistency
cons: May not give you a significant distance advantage over other irons

customer_reviews.title: My third wedge
customer_reviews.text: This is the third callaway wedge I've purchased from Amazon (sand, lob and gap). They are fabulous clubs worth much more than the price charged.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Baratto

customer_reviews.title: Great iron choice for mid to high handicappers. Me Likey!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased P Wedge. Very forgiving and great solid feel. I’m currently about a 20 HC and now want to trade in my old Callaway Big Bertha irons on a set of these. I hit my old wedge 110 and this one with a smooth normal swing 115 so it’s a little longer. I normally swap out grips right away but I don’t really want to change a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dalo

customer_reviews.title: Super 3 iron...
customer_reviews.text: Feels great. Hit it on short par 4's (under 375) and landing on the short grass. Almost out there w/ my playing partners hitting drivers. So I hit one more club into the greens....big woop. Better than from the woods! Metal shaft doesn't twist all over like most graphite so ball goes straighter. Looking at maybe getting the whole set....
customer_reviews.author: glenn

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed with Rouge Irons
customer_reviews.text: Made switch from some muscle back irons that were approaching about 15 years in age, and very impressed with the ways these feel on impact. Hit few makes and models at retailer. Though I was skeptical with the slightly larger club head and appearance at address, they come through very smoothly. Probably outright improvement in club type for my level of play. Clincher was being able to buy individual clubs, as I seldom hit 3-6, and apply that savings towards new driver.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: But it didn't come with directions so I'm still shooting in the low 100's... ; (
customer_reviews.author: U2

customer_reviews.title: Great club great seller
customer_reviews.text: So in my haste to get a new 5 iron I bought a left handed version vof this club. The seller was prompt with the response band how to do the refund. For the club I did get , while it is not a traditional lofted 5 iron ( i believe 23 degree loft) the length iof the club helps with get a pure hit. I know they marked this as used but for the life of me could not find a scratch or issue with it . This is the second club I bought and I plan to buy more
customer_reviews.author: Christopher long

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Needed something with zero bounce. This is perfect. easy to put club on ball. also a very good pitch club. I'm a "scraper" of the golf ball, so this zero bounce is good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Bak9

customer_reviews.title: Balanced Swing
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the swing. I haven't used it a lot yet, but it seems to be easier to get loft than my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Loren W Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Never go wrogn with this brand
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Callaway Golf user for years and have no intention to ever change. Why deviate from the best?
customer_reviews.author: James T. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Know what you want
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have paid closer attention to the thickness of the base before buying. I prefer a more hybrid like base. I’m having a hard time hitting the club. Mind game, I know.
customer_reviews.author: paula collins

customer_reviews.title: No real difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Rogue eight iron to see if these clubs might give me a little more distance than my old Callaway X-Hots irons. I see no difference in distance or control. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: bluejay nc

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good for my Swing Speed
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior golfer and this club is pretty good for my swing speed. The only thing I do not like is that the offset is a little too much.
customer_reviews.author: Bowie Man

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs for awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Great clubs, nice feel, smooth thru contact. Loved the fact I didn’t need to buy the hole set, purchased individual clubs
customer_reviews.author: albert e lemay

customer_reviews.title: Long and straight!
customer_reviews.text: They looked awesome right out of the box! I'm getting a little older and slower 56. Really it's the knee replacement and 4 anchors in my right shoulder! I love the feeling of a buttery forged iron but my body won't let me swing like that anymore. These are the next best thing fitted with the graphite shaft! Very LONG once I got used to the offset. Great golfclubs!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Very forgiving iron, nice sweet spot!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't miss hit a shot since I got this, very forgiving and has a large sweet spot.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: 6 Iron
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Item exactly as described. Highly recommend seller. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in excellent condition, fits me well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent condition, this is a great iron. Everyone’s different, but Rogue irons work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great club. My game still sucks but I don’t blame Callaway
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Hit calloway rogue 7 right men's senior flex for first time today on range and course. Highly recommend. Hits sweet and straight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: This has become my new favorite iron to hit. I get about 205yds carry with the 4 iron. Great feel and sound when you hit it right.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a damn curved shower rod I stead of a golf club...someone needs to help me out with this. The club was a gift for my grandson...this is disappointing and I want a replacement club now.
customer_reviews.author: carma anderson

customer_reviews.title: Greatest irons out there right now!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these clubs. Bought the set and needed this to help gap my wedges as I was hitting them way farther than my old irons. Ball literally launches off the face and with very good accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: DBrown

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Great club. Received club prior to due date. Great service
customer_reviews.author: M. MCDEVITT

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: Ok, but not quite as firm as a previous club
customer_reviews.author: Myron Herndon Jr

customer_reviews.title: Iron
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel, liking the Iron better than the hybrid.
customer_reviews.author: Roy A. Alexie Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This iron has been great. I’m truly satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nthebld

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, great used product
customer_reviews.text: Good length but short for me. Solid iron, great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Andre w.

customer_reviews.title: Callaway
customer_reviews.text: These clubs are everything they claim to be just love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good club
customer_reviews.text: Nice club. Bigger profile than my 20 yo old golfsmith wedge. Like the grip as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maun

customer_reviews.title: ShafQuick but broken
customer_reviews.text: Club showed up just in time for me to use it in our golf tournament. Unfortunately it showed up with the shaft broken inside the grip
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Johnson

customer_reviews.title: item came within 5 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to complete my set of golf clubs
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: This is an outstanding iron.
customer_reviews.text: I get more distance with this four iron than a three wood. It's easy to hit and very forgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: My choice of good golf clubs is the callaway rogue brand
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design and feel of this golf club. I like callaway golf clubs
customer_reviews.author: mark myers

customer_reviews.title: Great club,  great price!
customer_reviews.text: Came in great condition. Hitting the ball 20 yards further than my old titleist DCI's.
customer_reviews.author: adam wallace

customer_reviews.title: Hard to hit
customer_reviews.text: Hard to hit, I thought it was steel and not graphite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is not what I thought it would be. ...
customer_reviews.text: it is not what I thought it would be. I am back to hitting my 6 iron. you really need to know how to hit this long iron.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L. Myers

product_meta.title: Callaway Golf 2018 Men's Rogue Individual Iron
product_meta.description: Golf Digest 2018 Hot List Gold Medal Winner! Rogue Irons are the best combination of distance, accuracy and playability ever in a Callaway iron with our 360 Face Cup and VFT, multi-material construction, and Urethane Microspheres.
feature_bullets: 360 Face Cup + VFT for more Ball Speed
MIM'd Internal Standing Wave for Optimal Flight and Control

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
